DOC.brief_summary: This trial design enroll postmenopausal patient locally advanced metastatic , HER2- HR+ breast cancer amenable curative treatment surgery radiotherapy , whose disease progress prior endocrine therapy . Patients must undergo molecular pre-screening prior entry .
